document_data.mainbody:
Sherrill was a Dark Breaker of Umberlee, a member of the Bitch Queens clergy under Flood Tide Allandra Grey of the Water Queens House in Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Sherrill was a human woman with dark skin, dark brown curly hair and watery blue eyes. Her face was decorated with metallic-colored golden and aquamarine tattoos.
Sherrills Dark Breaker uniform was a set of skin-tight heavy chainmail dress. The armor was decorated with golden trim and had decorated metallic pauldrons. Her weapon of choice was a polearm.
Circa the , during the Absolute crisis, Dark Breaker Sherrill was among the churchs members who performed the faiths ceremonies and sang hymns in praise of the Bitch Queen. She was alongside Flood Tide Allandra Grey and other priestesses during Holli Dylfords last rites.
